page.title: 10Nocton Farms - Crops.
page.content: We wrote to Mr Ellis, the manager of Nocton Farms, asking for some information and he kindly replied with some useful facts. Nocton Farms have 70 people working for them.The land they farm amounts to 6,800 acres.They have 3,000 acres for wheat to use for making bread and biscuits,900 acres of peas and beans for frozen vegetable packs for supermarkets.There are 400 acres of potatoes for crisps,400 acres of oil-seed rape for vegetable oil and 1,000 acres of sugarbeet for sugar.There are also 100 acres of barley for making beer and animal feed.
